nodes.id: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

zh-cn: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司
凤凰卫视控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 以全球华人为主要目标受众的跨国传媒机构，总部位于香港。
description.en: A multinational media organization targeting the global Chinese population, headquartered in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的创办人，曾任董事局主席及行政总裁。
description.en: Founder of Phoenix TV, former Chairman of the Board and CEO.

description.zh-cn: 驻港中央企业，凤凰卫视的最大股东。
description.en: A Hong Kong-based central state-owned enterprise, the largest shareholder of Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的主要股东之一。
description.en: One of the major shareholders of Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视董事局主席兼行政总裁，原上海市人民政府新闻发言人。
description.en: Chairman of the Board and CEO of Phoenix TV, former spokesperson for the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视常务副总裁兼总编辑，原中央广播电视总台央视副台长。
description.en: Executive Vice President and Editor-in-Chief of Phoenix TV, former Deputy Director of CCTV at China Media Group.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的前身公司之一，为星空传媒（STAR TV）旗下公司。
description.en: One of the predecessor companies of Phoenix TV, under STAR TV.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的前身频道，原隶属于卫星电视有限公司。
description.en: The predecessor channel of Phoenix TV, originally part of Satellite Television Limited.

description.zh-cn: 将卫星电视有限公司股权售予新闻集团的商人。
description.en: Businessman who sold his shares in Satellite Television Limited to News Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 曾收购卫星电视有限公司并持有凤凰卫视股份的传媒集团。
description.en: A media conglomerate that acquired Satellite Television Limited and held shares in Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 新闻集团主席，主导了对卫星电视有限公司的收购。
description.en: Chairman of News Corporation who led the acquisition of Satellite Television Limited.

description.zh-cn: 由刘长乐控股的公司，是凤凰卫视的创始股东之一。
description.en: A company controlled by Liu Changle, one of the founding shareholders of Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家电视台，其下属公司曾是凤凰卫视的创始股东。
description.en: China's state broadcaster, whose subsidiary was a founding shareholder of Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 中央电视台广告部下属公司，凤凰卫视的创始股东之一。
description.en: A subsidiary of CCTV's advertising department, one of the founding shareholders of Phoenix TV.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的主频道，由卫视中文台改组而来。
description.en: The main channel of Phoenix TV, reorganized from the STAR Chinese Channel.

description.zh-cn: 2001年发生在美国的系列恐怖袭击事件。
description.en: A series of terrorist attacks that occurred in the United States in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 21世纪初以美国、英国军队为主的联合部队对伊拉克发动的军事行动。
description.en: A military operation against Iraq led by a coalition of forces primarily from the United States and the United Kingdom in the early 21st century.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视记者，曾在伊拉克战争期间进入巴格达采访。
description.en: Phoenix TV reporter who entered Baghdad to report during the Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 中国移动通信集团公司，于2006年购入凤凰卫视股份，成为第二大股东。
description.en: China Mobile Communications Corporation, which acquired shares in Phoenix TV in 2006, becoming the second-largest shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 全球最大私募基金公司之一，于2013年购入新闻集团持有的全部凤凰卫视股份。
description.en: One of the world's largest private equity firms, which acquired all of News Corporation's shares in Phoenix TV in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家广播电视机构，孙玉胜曾在此任职。
description.en: The state radio and television broadcaster of the People's Republic of China, where Sun Yusheng previously worked.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费电视台，负责转播凤凰卫视香港台在香港的免费地面电视信号。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong, responsible for transmitting the free-to-air signal of Phoenix Hong Kong Channel in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视旗下首个粤语频道，后在香港免费电视落地。
description.en: Phoenix TV's first Cantonese channel, which later became available on free-to-air television in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的执政当局，曾因凤凰卫视的亲中共立场而拒绝其落地。
description.en: The governing authority in Taiwan, which denied Phoenix TV landing rights due to its pro-CCP stance.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视的谈话类节目，于2017年9月停播。
description.en: A talk show on Phoenix TV that was suspended in September 2017.

description.zh-cn: 其政府对凤凰卫视的节目进行审查和过滤。
description.en: Its government censors and filters Phoenix TV's programs.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 刘长乐通过其控股的今日亚洲有限公司，联合其他两方共同创立了凤凰卫视。
description.en: Liu Changle, through his holding company Today's Asia Limited, co-founded Phoenix TV with two other parties.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为创始股东之一，持有45%的股份。
description.en: As one of the founding shareholders, holding a 45% stake.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为创始股东之一，持有10%的股份。
description.en: As one of the founding shareholders, holding a 10% stake.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 作为创始股东之一，持有45%的股份。
description.en: As one of the founding shareholders, holding a 45% stake.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

position.zh-cn: 董事局主席兼行政总裁
position.en: Chairman of the Board and CEO

description.zh-cn: 刘长乐自创办起一直担任凤凰卫视的领导人，直到2021年6月22日辞任。
description.en: Liu Changle served as the leader of Phoenix TV since its founding until his resignation on June 22, 2021.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

position.zh-cn: 董事局主席兼行政总裁
position.en: Chairman of the Board and CEO

description.zh-cn: 于2021年2月获委任为公司行政总裁，后兼任董事局主席。
description.en: Appointed as CEO in February 2021, and later also became Chairman of the Board.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 于2021年2月出任凤凰卫视常务副总裁、总编辑。
description.en: Appointed as Executive Vice President and Editor-in-Chief of Phoenix TV in February 2021.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视中文台

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视中文台由原卫星电视有限公司旗下的卫视中文台改组而来，后者于1996年3月31日分拆。
description.en: Phoenix Chinese Channel was reorganized from the former STAR Chinese Channel under Satellite Television Limited, which was split on March 31, 1996.

relationships.target: 卫星电视有限公司

description.zh-cn: 新闻集团从李泽楷手中收购了卫星电视有限公司的控股权，并于1995年完成全部收购。
description.en: News Corporation acquired a controlling stake in Satellite Television Limited from Richard Li and completed the full acquisition in 1995.

relationships.target: 中国中央电视台

description.zh-cn: 华颖国际有限公司是中央电视台广告部的下属公司。
description.en: Huaying International Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of CCTV's advertising department.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国移动于2006年6月购入新闻集团持有的凤凰卫视19.9%股份，成为第二大股东。
description.en: In June 2006, China Mobile acquired 19.9% of Phoenix TV shares held by News Corporation, becoming the second-largest shareholder.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: TPG资本于2013年10月购入新闻集团持有的全部凤凰卫视股份。
description.en: In October 2013, TPG Capital acquired all of News Corporation's shares in Phoenix TV.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 新闻集团于2013年10月将其持有的全部凤凰卫视股份出售给TPG资本，自此不再持有凤凰卫视股份。
description.en: In October 2013, News Corporation sold all of its shares in Phoenix TV to TPG Capital, and has since held no shares in Phoenix TV.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 紫荆文化集团于2021年4月从刘长乐手中购入凤凰卫视股份，成为最大股东。
description.en: In April 2021, Bauhinia Culture Group acquired shares of Phoenix TV from Liu Changle, becoming the largest shareholder.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 信德集团于2021年4月从刘长乐手中购入凤凰卫视股份。
description.en: In April 2021, Shun Tak Holdings acquired shares of Phoenix TV from Liu Changle.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 刘长乐于2021年4月出售其持有的全部股份，并于同年6月22日辞任董事会主席，正式退出凤凰卫视。
description.en: Liu Changle sold all his shares in April 2021 and resigned as Chairman of the Board on June 22 of the same year, officially withdrawing from Phoenix TV.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视对911事件进行了36小时的直播报道，此举奠定了其在国际突发新闻报道中的地位。
description.en: Phoenix TV's 36-hour live coverage of the 9/11 attacks established its position in international breaking news reporting.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视对伊拉克战争进行了持续25天的直播，其记者闾丘露薇成为首批进入巴格达采访的华人记者，进一步巩固了其新闻报道的声誉。
description.en: Phoenix TV's continuous 25-day live coverage of the Iraq War, with its reporter Lüqiu Luwei being one of the first Chinese journalists to enter Baghdad, further solidified its reputation in news reporting.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 闾丘露薇曾是凤凰卫视的知名记者。
description.en: Lüqiu Luwei was a well-known reporter for Phoenix TV.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视香港台

description.zh-cn: 经香港通讯事务管理局批准，电视广播有限公司（TVB）于2024年4月22日起，在其免费地面电视85频道转播凤凰卫视香港台，标志着凤凰卫视正式在香港大气电波落地。
description.en: With the approval of the Communications Authority, Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB) began broadcasting Phoenix Hong Kong Channel on its free-to-air terrestrial channel 85 from April 22, 2024, marking Phoenix TV's official launch on Hong Kong's airwaves.

relationships.target: 凤凰卫视投资（控股）有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因其公司股权转换后被认定为陆资企业，中华民国陆委会要求其台湾记者站于2022年5月14日前关闭。
description.en: After its shareholding structure changed, Phoenix TV was identified as a mainland-funded enterprise. The Mainland Affairs Council of the Republic of China ordered its Taiwan bureau to close by May 14, 2022.

relationships.target: 锵锵三人行

description.zh-cn: 因节目调整，凤凰卫视旗下节目《锵锵三人行》于2017年9月12日突然停播，该事件发生于中共十九大召开前夕，引发外界关于内容审查的争议。
description.en: Due to program adjustments, the Phoenix TV show 'Qiang Qiang San Ren Xing' was abruptly suspended on September 12, 2017. This occurred just before the 19th National Congress of the CCP, sparking controversy about content censorship.
